Privacy Policy

Samunnati Financial Intermediation & Services Private Limited (hereinafter referred as “Samunnati”, “Company”, “We”, “Us” or “Our”), a company registered under the Companies Act 2013 having its registered office at Baid Hi Tech Park, 8th Floor, No. 129-B, East Coast Road, Thiruvanmiyur Chennai 600041, owns, manages and operates this application under the brand name ‘One.Samunnati’ (hereinafter referred to as “Application”). The term Company shall include its affiliates and subsidiaries.

The Company has created this Privacy Policy to demonstrate its commitment and ensure compliance with the applicable Data Privacy laws.

For the purposes of this Privacy Policy the term “User(s)” and wherever the context so requires “You”, “Your”, “Yourself” shall mean any natural person who is an employee of the Company and who accesses or uses the Application.

We respect Your privacy and are committed to protecting it through Our compliance with this Privacy Policy.

This Privacy Policy describes:

  • the types of information including Personal Information that We may collect from You when you access or use the Application and to provide You the services chosen by You on the Application;
  • Our practices for collecting, using, maintaining, protecting and disclosing that information including Security practices and Procedures adopted by Us to protect your Personal Information collected by Us;
  • This Privacy Policy applies only to the information We collect through Our Application or in email or text and / or other electronic communications sent through or in connection therewith (collectively “User Information”). When You submit User Information on the Application, it shall be deemed that You have granted Us the right to collect, store, process, handle and use such User Information, in accordance with this Privacy Policy (as amended from time to time)

A. The Information that is collected:

  1. The Application is a Mobile version of the One.Samunnati platform. The Version 1 of the Application will encompass the approvals in respect of the following functions like Business, Credit, Credit Committees, IT Service Desk, etc. (“Purpose”)

    The Application may add additional features and services in the future versions from time to time, which will be updated to privacy policy made available online.

  2. In order to fulfil the above Purpose, We are required to collect certain information, which inter-alia includes:
    • Details of Your visits to Application, including but not limited to, login and log out time, location, and other communication data;
    • Your usage details including time, frequency, features used, etc. by You;
    • Your device information, including unique identifiers, browser type and settings, device type and settings, operating system, mobile network information including operator name and phone number and application version number. We also collect information about the interaction of your apps, browsers and devices with our Application, including IP address, crash reports, system activity, and the date, time and referrer URL of your request.

  3. Prior to registration of the Application, you will be asked to agree to the ‘Terms of Usage’ in order to use the Application. The Terms of Usage will inter-alia set out the nature of information/data collected and stored, the manner of usage of the data, the manner of taking consent for sharing of data if required, and the actions that a User can take on the Application.

    By using this Application, You consent to the collection, storage, and use of the User Information that you provide on the Application, and You consent to Our collection of and of any changes or updates that you may provide to the User Information. We collect only such User Information that We believe to be relevant for the purpose of identification and verification and is required for the Purpose. It is clarified that we shall not be liable, for any reason whatsoever, for the authenticity of any User Information provided by you to us. You hereby represent, warrant and confirm that the user information provided by You is and shall continue to be valid, true and accurate.

  4. Use of Cookies: We, and third parties with whom We partner, shall use pixel tags, cookies, web beacons, mobile device IDs, “flash cookies” and similar files or technologies to collect and store information in respect to Your use of the Application and third party application. A cookie can be understood as a small text file that is stored on Your mobile that enables Us to recognize You (for example, as a registered user) when You visit Our Application, Your preferences and settings, enhance Your experience, perform research and analytics, track Your use of Our Application, and assist with security and administrative functions. This anonymous information is maintained distinctly and is not linked to the User Information You submit to the Company. A pixel tag (also called a web beacon) can be understood as a small graphic with embedded invisibly on a webpage (or an online ad or email) and a unique identifier, and is used to count or track things like activity on a webpage or ad impressions or clicks, as well as to access cookies stored on Users’ computers. Additionally, You may encounter cookies or other similar devices on certain pages of the Application that are placed by third parties. We do not control the use of cookies by third parties and shall not be liable for any reason whatsoever for these third party cookies. We advise You to check their privacy policies for information about third parties cookies and other practices. We do not control the practices of such third parties/ partners and their privacy policies/ cookies policies which govern their interactions with You.

    Kindly note that most browsers / operating systems are set to automatically allow cookies. Most cookies are session cookies that are automatically deleted from Your hard drive / device when You close the Application. HOWEVER, IT MAY BE POSSIBLE TO DISABLE SOME (BUT NOT ALL) COOKIES THROUGH YOUR MOBILE DEVICE OR BROWSER SETTINGS, BUT DOING SO MAY INTERFERE WITH CERTAIN FUNCTIONALITIES ON THE APPLICATION.

B. Sharing of Information:

  1. You can be assured that Samunnati does not believe in sharing any Personal Information with any individual, company or organization. Information is only shared with your consent.
  2. The following are the instances where we will be required to share information collected from and in connection to the Application:
    • For legal purposes, requirements, to comply with applicable laws;
    • To Our affiliates, subsidiaries and related parties;
    • Any person for maintaining security, operating Application, to enquire or protect from any fraud, hacking.;
    • For enforcing or applying Our terms of use and other agreements, including for billing and collection purposes;
    • If the disclosure, in Our reasonable opinion, is necessary or appropriate to protect Our rights, property, or safety, customers or others. This will include exchanging information with other companies and organizations for the purposes of fraud protection, etc.;
    • For providing additional features and to enable user experience of the Application; and
    • For any other purpose in connection with the aforesaid
    Please note that even the limited sharing of information with the third parties mentioned above, will be subject to such third party having robust privacy policies of their own before such information is shared with them.
  3. We shall not disclose any Personal Information/Sensitive Personal Data to any external organization unless it has the consent of the provider, or are required by law or have previously informed the provider.
  4. Disclosure Limitation – Data collected for a particular purpose/usage shall be used for that purpose only and shall not be used for any other purpose without the consent of the User or other legal permission.
  5. We also undertake to respond to court orders or any other legal processes in order to exercise or establish the legal rights for defending any claims.
  6. This Application may store cookies for Microsoft login authentication and the same shall be subject to their privacy policy and terms. You are requested to read and understand their privacy policy and terms.

C. Your data protection rights include:

  1. The right to erasure – You have the right to request that Samunnati erase your data, under certain conditions.
  2. The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that Samunnati restrict the processing of your data, under certain conditions.
  3. The right to object to processing – You have the right to object to Samunnati processing of your data, under certain conditions.

D. Changes to Privacy Policy:

We may update this privacy statement to reflect changes to our information practices. If we make any material changes we will notify You by email or SMS message and by means of a notice on the Application prior to the change becoming effective. We encourage You to periodically review this page for the latest information on our privacy practices.

E. Contact us:

Please Contact Us (through “contact us” link) regarding any questions regarding

  1. this Privacy Policy;
  2. practices of this Application,
  3. to mention any grievances/complaints-our chief grievance officer (gro@samunnati.com) will within 3-4 Business Days revert to you or
  4. Your dealings with this Application.
